field_1696885832019.description: The name of the entity this invoice is addressed to

field_1696885860948.description: The name of the vendor that issued this invoice or bill

field_1696885917666.description: The invoice number associated with this invoice

field_1696885941490.description: The purchase order number or numbers associated with this invoice. This may also be called an order number or similar or the equivalent in a foreign language. You should read the invoice from the perspective of the recipient, and aways prefer "your po number" over "our po number" if both are present. If there is more than one PO number for this invoice, return them all separated by a comma.

field_1696886061749.description: The net amount of this invoice, which is the total cost of goods, but does not include tax or delivery costs. Respond with a correctly formatted decimal number. DO NOT include any currency symbols or commas.

field_1696886228537.description: The total of this invoice, which is the total cost of goods INCLUDING tax and delivery costs. Respond with a correctly formatted decimal number. DO NOT include any currency symbols or commas.

field_1696886295071.description: The delivery cost indicated on the invoice if present. Respond with a correctly formatted decimal number. DO NOT include any currency symbols or commas.

field_1696886307280.description: The total tax amount for the invoice, if specified. Respond with a correctly formatted decimal number. DO NOT include any currency symbols or commas.

field_1696886322992.description: The three letter currency symbol for the currency that is used to denominate this invoice. Do your best to infer the currency if it isn't explicitly written. The address of the supplier could be a helpful clue here.

field_1696886438538.description: The date that this invoice was issued in MM/DD/YYYY format.

field_1696886799693.description: Details about the line items in the invoice. There may be many line items so take your time and be careful to include every single one. Do not miss anything. With that said, line items should only be included for goods represented in the invoice. DO NOT include separate line items for freight, tax, discounts etc.

product_id.description: A unique identifier describing this line item

po_number.description: The purchase order number associated with this line item if specified. This may also be called an order number or similar or the equivalent in a foreign language. DO NOT return a value here if there is a single PO number for the entire invoice.

description.description: A short description of the goods represented in this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of the line item

unit.description: The unit of measurement used to denominate the price of this item. Examples of possible units of measurement include each, count, ea, gallon, per 1000, ä¸ª, etc. These are just examples, use your best judgment to infer the unit that is being used.

unit_price.description: The cost per unit of this line item. Be careful not to confuse this with the total amount for this line item.

extended_amount.description: The total amount charged for this line item in the invoice. Be careful not to confuse this value with the unit price of the line item.
